MysticMod:ComboCasterPower.NAME: Combo Caster
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn add

MysticMod:DisciplinePower.NAME: Discipline
DESCRIPTIONS: Begin each turn as if you had already played

MysticMod:DoublecastPower.NAME: Doublecast
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next Spell card is played twice.

MysticMod:GainDexterityPower.NAME: Overextended
DESCRIPTIONS: Dexterity at the end of your turn.

MysticMod:GeminiFormPower.NAME: Gemini Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Attack or Skill you play each turn counts as both a Spell and a Technique.
Attacks or Skills you play each turn counts as both a Spell and a Technique.

MysticMod:HastePower.NAME: Haste
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 card and gain [E] each turn.

MysticMod:MirrorEntityPower.NAME: Mirror Entity
DESCRIPTIONS: Spells and Techniques played carry over to the next turn

MysticMod:MomentumPower.NAME: Momentum
DESCRIPTIONS: Spells and Techniques deal extra damage and apply extra block for each card of the other type played this turn

MysticMod:MysticalShieldPower.NAME: Mystical Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is reduced to 10 instead of 0 at the start of the turn.

MysticMod:MysticalShieldUpgradedPower.NAME: Mystical Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is set to 10 instead of 0 at the start of the turn.

MysticMod:SpellsPlayedNextTurnPower.NAME: Spells Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Start next turn as if you already played

MysticMod:SpontaneousCasterPower.NAME: Spontaneous Caster
DESCRIPTIONS: Spells cost [E] less to play, Exhaust when played, and then generate a random spell in your discard pile.

MysticMod:TechniquesPlayedNextTurnPower.NAME: Techniques Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Start next turn as if you already played
